attributes.action: return the governance of the United Kingdom to its people, the United Kings, in the following ways:
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
-install internet in all homes; on major issues (Iraq, EU) enact an online vote so the country may be said to be a true democracy.

-fire politicians when it is determined they have deceived the public (G Brown & the EU, T Blair & WMD).

-govern the country according to the opinions of the MAJORITY.

-abolish all forms of prejudice in pay grades & job opportunities, to be punishable by fining.

-relocate the military from Iraq to the nation's streets and schools on disciplinary duty.

-place a strict cap on immigration, so no more than 10k ppl/annum move to the UK.

-admit education is failing; return to old "O" & "A" levels; enforce discipline harder than any time in the last 10 years.

-punish criminals to the furthest extent, with mandatory jailtime as punishment for even carrying a weapon.

-secularise all UK schools; admit no religion in institutions of academia.

-reinstate national service for school leavers, juvenile delinquents & yobs.

- Ensure the UK hits its environmental goals.

-legalise prostitution & tax it as a legitimate form of commerce with imposed health checks.

-embrace exceptionalism in all forms; sporting, academic, or economic; and deplore mediocrity.
